body_html: @mrry yeah cmake is going to go away but cbalint13 is up for maintaining it (discussed on the build@ mailing list) so we'll get it in now and see how things go in future. If it works well then we can have cmake as a separate repo or something.

body: @mrry yeah cmake is going to go away but cbalint13 is up for maintaining it (discussed on the build@ mailing list) so we'll get it in now and see how things go in future. If it works well then we can have cmake as a separate repo or something.
